item.title: AI is a commodity?
item.description:
AI industry is in a race to build smart and more intelligent models (GPT, Gemini, Claude, Grok, Llama) and we are largely constrained and powered by compute. How does access to compute determine and influence the scientific breakthroughs and research that tends to happen in bursts? Who owns access to intelligence? How does relationship with neoclouds and hyperscalers help frontier labs help innovate and have a moat?
#ai #llm #technology #business
Chapter 00:00 Intro 00:39 Cost of intelligence 01:22 Gold vs Intelligence 01:44 Intelligence vs Inference 03:41 AI innovation cycle 04:26 Analysis: AI innovations 05:28 Access to Compute 08:41 Conclusion
